name: Elemental Resonance: Enduring Rock
title: Elemental Resonance: Enduring Rock
desc: Bedrock shall make the hills unshakable.

skills.desc: During this round, after the next time your character deals Geo DMG: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides Shield, grant one such Status with 3 Shield points. (You must have at least 2 Geo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
